title: GET_PLAYER_WEAPON_DAMAGE_MODIFIER
content:
0x2A3D7CDA// GetPlayerWeaponDamageModifier
float GET_PLAYER_WEAPON_DAMAGE_MODIFIER(Player playerId);Parameters:playerId: The player index.Returns: The value of player weapon damage modifier.A getter for SET_PLAYER_WEAPON_DAMAGE_MODIFIER.
codeBlocks:
local player = PlayerId()
-- Example usage for GET_PLAYER_WEAPON_DAMAGE_MODIFIER
GetPlayerWeaponDamageModifier(player)
